itemLabel: John Brooks, Baron Brooks of Tremorfa

wikipedia_page.main: John Edward "Jack" Brooks, Baron Brooks of Tremorfa DL (12 April 1927 – 4 March 2016) was a Welsh politician and boxing functionary.

response: *John Brooks, Baron Brooks of Tremorfa (1927–2016), instrumental in the redevelopment of the Docks area of Cardiff now known as Cardiff Bay.

**John Brooks, Baron Brooks of Tremorfa, 88, politician and boxing executive, President of the British Boxing Board of Control and Welsh Sports Hall of Fame.

*4 March - John Brooks, Baron Brooks of Tremorfa, politician and boxing executive, President of the British Boxing Board of Control and Welsh Sports Hall of Fame, 88Lord Jack Brooks, who laid the foundations for Cardiff's transformation, has died aged 88
